participant_1.background:
I love to read.
My favorite movie is goodfellas.
I enjoy watching football and hockey games.
I am a proofreader for a greeting card company.

participant_2.background:
Although i m studying to be a doctor , animals like me.
I m always early.
I volunteer with dogs.
I am a graduate student.

content.text: Nice to meet you, (participant_1). What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, volunteer with dogs, and watch sports.
Wow, those are all great things to do! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book. What's your favorite historical fiction novel?
That's a tough one, but I think I'd have to say The Thorn Birds by Colleen McCullough.
Oh, I love that book! It's so beautiful and heartbreaking.
Right? I love the characters and the story. It's one of those books that you never forget.
Me too. I've read it multiple times. What's your favorite mystery novel?
I think I'd have to say The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo by Stieg Larsson.
Oh, that's a great one! I love the series.
Me too! They're so suspenseful and well-written.
I agree. They're some of my favorite books.
It's nice to meet someone who also loves to read.
Me too! It's always nice to find a fellow bookworm.
